author: ceki
msg: RollingFileAppender no longer activates subcomponents. This is inline with the
way JoranConfigurator handles configuration of sub-component activation.

author: ceki
msg: Removed the comment disabling the creation of the sdf variable.

author: ceki
msg: Simplified the actions taken when closing. This ensures that layout
header and footer are written even in case of rolling files.
However, in case a file is opened and closed multiple times, the header
and footer get written multiple times as well.
